Yan's right, everyone. What's the fun of RPing when all you read is angry 
posts?

* Irons feet slammed against the ground with a thud and earth shot up in 
every direction, the ground shaking.
She'd gotten hit by half of Marine's shots but was still going strong, 
though acir leaked from small cuts and gashes that scared her chest and 
stomach.
IR had landed almost nose to nose with Marine but what would a 20 foot 
nightmare possibly have in mind for an enemy such as him?
She bared her teeth, black lips pulling back to show two sets of jaws, one 
behind the other. Acid/saliva dropped from her lips while her eyes focused 
on Marine. The look saying " Dare move?"*
